ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 large Roma tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped
recipe: Combine avocado, chicken stock, heavy cream, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, tequila, salt, and pepper in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a container, cover, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Stir in tomatoes and fresh cilantro before serving.
